title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2050.4 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2050.4 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted, and
records produced, during all hours regularly open for business. These hours are
9 a.m. to 5 p.m. on business days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2050.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
